p: Infusions of thyme have been used for their health benefits for thousands of years as a cold treatment, antispasmodic, a carminative agent, traditional medicine in digestive problems and an expectorant for upper respiratory tract infections. In addition, the potential therapeutic effects of thymol have been used for the treatment of disorders affecting different organ systems, such as the cardiovascular, nervous, and respiratory systems [ 83, 84, 85].
